labels.name: story
labels.value: Check if all login patters are successful

name: loginTest
description: Check the functionality of the login page

parameters.name: arg3
parameters.value:
Username: 
Any username
Password:
Anything except secret_sauce

parameters.name: arg2
parameters.value:
1. Go to:
https://www.saucedemo.com
2. Input any username and a wrong password
3. Press Login
4. Capture the error message

parameters.name: arg4
parameters.value:
User should not be able to login. 
An error message should be shown: 
"Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"
